div.h3: Welcome to Brush School District RE-2J

div.div: Notice of Virtual School Board Meetings
Click here for the Notice of Virtual School Board Meetings READ MORE... about Notice of Virtual School Board Meetings

We want to make sure families have everything needed to stay safe, healthy, and secure. If you are experiencing hard times or stress during this time, please reach out to a member of your student support team. Click here for the Behavioral Health and Support website! READ MORE... about Behavioral Health and Support

Youth hear the news and others talking about “COVID-19”. It is important they receive accurate information, appropriate for their developmental level. Information also needs to be presented so as to not increase levels of stress or anxiety. Click here for more info and helpful tips. READ MORE... about COVID-19 Health Resources
School remains closed through April 30th, Graduation plans, and grades for online learning: Dr. Wilson explains in his latest video. READ MORE... about Dr. Wilson Video - 04/03/2020
Meal Delivery, Chromebook Assistance and Hotspot Request Forms
Click here to sign up for meal delivery, chromebook assistance or request an internet hotspot. READ MORE... about Meal Delivery, Chromebook Assistance and Hotspot Request Forms
CDE guidance regarding changes resulting from Coronavirus 2019

Dear Brush Community, Thank you for all your patience and understanding during this challenging time for our school district. As you are aware, Governor Polis on March 18 issued an Executive Order directing all schools to suspend in-person instruction through April 17, 2020, in order to limit the spread of Coronavirus 2019. Additionally, you should be aware that the governor has indicated that there is a high possibility in-person instruction will not resume this school year. As a result, changes will be necessary for some important educational functions, such as the number of teacher-pupil instructional hours, special education and graduation requirements. Click here for more info. READ MORE... about CDE guidance regarding changes resulting from Coronavirus 2019
Covid-19 Updates - Brush School District Closed until at least April 6, 2020

Click for more info on the Covid-19 situation, including the decision to delay the return to classes and programs until at least April 17th. READ MORE... about Covid-19 Updates - Brush School District Closed until at least April 6, 2020

We will be handing out chromebooks to students on: Monday, March 23rd: 11 am to 3 pm Tuesday, March 24th: 7 am to 11 am. Click here for more info and Pickup Instructions. READ MORE... about Chromebook Distribution Plans
